basic.floral_language:
Rhombophyllum nelii
Floriography: tough, vigorous, tenacious
The plant is short, has many branches, fleshy leaves light to gray green with split tips, easy to grow and take care, suitable for small combinations with other succulents in pots. 
Likes sunlight, but avoid scorching sunlight, has a short dormant period in summer, place under bright scattered light. Flowers sometimes, has scape emerging from the middle of leaves. Flowers are yellow.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, yellow flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green to gray green

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, dormant in summer under high temperatures, put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when leaves become soft, reduce watering in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
